snippet.title: Detroit Red Wings trade rumors: On playoff bubble, will Wings make deadline noise?
snippet.description:
Detroit Red Wings trade rumors: On playoff bubble, will Wings make deadline noise? by Adam Gretz on Feb 27 2014, 3:50p
The Red Wings are typically quiet at the deadline. Will that be the case this year as they fight for a playoff berth?

David Roth traveled to Qatar for a closer look at the World Cup's future home. Below is the second installment of his five-part series. Previously: Part I, Destination everywhere. ★ ★ ★ ...

snippet.title: Free-agent starting pitchers: A consumer's guide
snippet.description:
Free-agent starting pitchers: A consumer's guide by Cee Angi on Nov 1 2013, 1:30p
It's a thin market this winter, particularly in the left-handed pitching department, so look for trades to liven things up.

snippet.title: NHL Season Preview 2013-14
snippet.description:
NHL Season Preview 2013-14 by Travis Hughes on Sep 30 2013, 2:16p
SB Nation's comprehensive, beautiful, team-by-team preview of the 2013-14 NHL season.

snippet.title: Johan Franzen buyout is 'crazy,' says Red Wings GM
snippet.description:
Johan Franzen buyout is 'crazy,' says Red Wings GM by Matt Brigidi on Jun 3 2013, 9:39a
General manager Ken Holland says Johan Franzen will not be extended a compliance buyout. However, the door has been left open for that option being used on another player.

snippet.title: Kings' Twitter genius goes wrong as Kevin Ryder makes rape comment
snippet.description:
Kings' Twitter genius goes wrong as Kevin Ryder makes rape comment by Travis Hughes on May 22 2013, 11:47a
Letting a morning radio show host run your Twitter feed is a risky move. It didn't pay off for the Los Angeles Kings.

snippet.title: Blackhawks vs. Red Wings Game 1: Andrew Shaw forgets to use the brakes
snippet.description:
Blackhawks vs. Red Wings Game 1: Andrew Shaw forgets to use the brakes by Pat Iversen on May 15 2013, 8:58p
Shaw elbowed Jakub Kindl while trying to slow down.

snippet.title: NHL trade rumors: Ryane Clowe, Jaromir Jagr believed to be on the move
snippet.description:
NHL trade rumors: Ryane Clowe, Jaromir Jagr believed to be on the move by Matt Brigidi on Apr 2 2013, 12:59p
A daily roundup of trade rumors in the NHL (remember, rumors are not always reports). With the trade deadline a little more than 24 hours away, the rumors are at a premium. Here's everything you'll...

snippet.title: TSN, Sportsnet fight the battle for NHL trade deadline supremacy
snippet.description:
TSN, Sportsnet fight the battle for NHL trade deadline supremacy by Steve Lepore on Apr 2 2013, 9:00a
Two networks north of the border shine on NHL trade deadline day, and their coverage invades the U.S. as well.

snippet.title: NHL schedule: Five questions for Monday night
snippet.description:
NHL schedule: Five questions for Monday night by Matt Brigidi on Apr 1 2013, 3:17p
A daily feature which asks the five hardest-hitting questions imaginable about this day in the NHL. Will our quandaries be answered? (That doesn't count as one of the five questions.)
